chunks.zh: 面试被拒、单身迷茫、健康透支，感觉自己一事无成
chunks.en: Rejected from interview, feeling lost as a single, health overdrawn, feeling like I have accomplished nothing

chunks.zh: 最近状态真的很差，感觉自己在事业、感情和健康上都过得一塌糊涂
chunks.en: My recent state is really bad, I feel like I'm doing terribly in career, relationship, and health

chunks.zh: 半年没工作了，今天面试了 dw 的技术支持，整体来看我的经验和要求是匹配的。
chunks.en: It's been half a year since I worked. Today I interviewed for technical support at DW. Overall, my experience matches the requirements.

chunks.zh: 上午一面聊得很顺利，没多久就通知下午二面了，我还挺兴奋的，觉得机会很大。
chunks.en: The first interview in the morning went smoothly, and I was notified for the second interview in the afternoon not long after. I was quite excited and felt that the opportunity was great.

chunks.zh: 但到了二面，突然紧张了，发挥得一般，不过整体感觉也还行，聊了 40 多分钟。
chunks.en: But when I got to the second interview, I suddenly got nervous and didn't perform very well, but overall it felt okay, we talked for more than 40 minutes.

chunks.zh: 结束后被告知面试没通过，也没说具体原因，当下真的有点懵，原本很期待这份工作，觉得自己各方面都符合，结果还是不要我，心里挺难受的😢
chunks.en: After the interview, I was told that I didn't pass, and no specific reason was given. I was really confused at the time. I was really looking forward to this job and felt that I met all the requirements, but they still didn't want me. I feel very sad 😢

chunks.zh: 除了工作，感情方面也挺迷茫的。
chunks.en: Besides work, I'm also quite confused about relationships.

chunks.zh: 到现在还没谈过恋爱，以前上学时完全没这方面的想法，毕业后一个人在上海工作，慢慢开始感到孤单，才意识到自己也想找个人一起生活。
chunks.en: I haven't been in a relationship yet. I didn't have any thoughts on this when I was in school. After graduating, I worked alone in Shanghai, and slowly began to feel lonely. I realized that I also want to find someone to live with.

chunks.zh: 但完全不知道该怎么认识合适的异性，也不知道怎么开始一段感情。
chunks.en: But I have no idea how to meet suitable people of the opposite sex, or how to start a relationship.

chunks.zh: 总觉得自己社交圈子太小了，遇不到合适的人，时间久了也开始焦虑了。
chunks.en: I always feel that my social circle is too small and I can't meet the right people. Over time, I started to feel anxious.

chunks.zh: 身体健康上也没照顾好自己，本来就睡眠不好 还喜欢熬夜，也不好好吃饭，很多坏习惯明知道不行，但就是改不掉。
chunks.en: I haven't taken good care of my health either. I already have poor sleep and like to stay up late, and I don't eat properly. I know that many bad habits are not good, but I just can't change them.

chunks.zh: 这几年身体状态感觉变差了，偶尔也会担心，但就是控制不住自己。
chunks.en: I feel that my physical condition has deteriorated in the past few years, and I occasionally worry about it, but I just can't control myself.

chunks.zh: 现在的感觉就是，生活好难，什么都没有做好，什么都不顺利。
chunks.en: The feeling now is that life is so hard, nothing is done well, and nothing goes smoothly.

chunks.zh: 马上 25 岁了，事业没起色，感情一片空白，连身体健康都在透支，真的不知道该怎么调整……有点迷茫，也有点丧
chunks.en: I'm almost 25 years old, my career hasn't improved, my love life is blank, and even my health is overdrawn. I really don't know how to adjust... I'm a little confused and a little discouraged.

chunks.zh: 身体健康也没事，25 岁而已，跑跑步健健身，少起飞，不去商务舱
chunks.en: Health is also not a big deal, only 25 years old. Just run and exercise, fly less, and don't go to business class.

chunks.zh: 我 25 岁的时候还在研究所为了学历给人当🐶一样使唤，动不动叫我去大门口帮他拿快递，帮他搬个东西啥的，看不到前途出路，人也胖不自信没有谈过恋爱，见到女孩子话都不会说，又穷又样衰，对未来一片迷茫现在 36 了还不是一样老婆孩子热炕头
chunks.en: When I was 25, I was still working like a dog in the research institute for a degree. I was often asked to go to the gate to pick up express delivery for him, help him move things, etc. I couldn't see any future, I was fat and insecure, I had never been in love, I couldn't even talk to girls, I was poor and ugly, and I was confused about the future. Now at 36, isn't it the same with a wife and children and a warm bed?

chunks.zh: 才 25 岁，这么年轻，主要是目前大环境确实不咋地~
chunks.en: Only 25 years old, so young, the main thing is that the current environment is really not good~

chunks.zh: 我们总以为今后还会遇到很多人，但其实真正能交流的很少很少。
chunks.en: We always think we will meet many people in the future, but in fact, there are very few who can really communicate.

chunks.zh: 多去参加写社交活动，认识异性去，有了感情经历，才真正开始生活
chunks.en: Go to more social activities, meet the opposite sex, and only when you have relationship experience, you truly  start living

chunks.zh: 年轻的时候也一样有这些烦恼的， 熬过去之后发现还有其他的烦恼。
chunks.en: When you are young, you have the same troubles. After you get through it, you find that there are other troubles.

chunks.zh: 只能劝告自己别焦虑，珍惜当下，抓住机会不要犹豫，千万别错过。
chunks.en: I can only advise myself not to worry, cherish the moment, seize the opportunity and don't hesitate, don't miss it.

chunks.zh: 熬夜太难戒了，一过节假日就打回原形。
chunks.en: It's too difficult to quit staying up late, and it goes back to the original state after holidays.

chunks.zh: 从管理自己的身体健康开始吧。
chunks.en: Start by managing your physical health.

chunks.zh: 身体是精神的容器，身体健康了也有益于心理健康。
chunks.en: The body is the container of the spirit, and physical health is also beneficial to mental health.

chunks.zh: 运动，无论是力量训练还是有氧运动，都是自我管理最基础且最切实可行的方式。
chunks.en: Exercise, whether it is strength training or aerobic exercise, is the most basic and practical way of self-management.

chunks.zh: 自我管理和提升也应从这些看似简单却极其重要的基础开始做起。
chunks.en: Self-management and improvement should also start from these seemingly simple but extremely important foundations.

chunks.zh: 坚持锻炼，健康饮食，规律作息，健康的状态就从健康的生活方式开始。
chunks.en: Stick to exercise, eat healthy, and have a regular schedule. A healthy state starts with a healthy lifestyle.

chunks.zh: 健身也是一种确定性极强的事情，投入一定会有回报。
chunks.en: Fitness is also a very certain thing, and investment will definitely pay off.

chunks.zh: 相较而言，工作取决于市场供需关系和经济大环境，恋爱也有缘分和运气的成分。
chunks.en: In comparison, work depends on the market supply and demand and the economic environment, and love also has elements of fate and luck.

chunks.zh: 这些都包含了许多超出个人掌控的变量，而身体管理的主动权完全在自己手中，是最适合用来建立自信心与成就感的起点。
chunks.en: These all contain many variables beyond personal control, and the initiative of body management is entirely in one's own hands, which is the most suitable starting point for building self-confidence and a sense of accomplishment.

chunks.zh: 可以自如地管理好自己的身体，就可以延伸到对生活方式的管理，然后再渐进到对人生规划的管理。
chunks.en: If you can freely manage your own body, you can extend it to managing your lifestyle, and then gradually to managing your life plan.

chunks.zh: OP 加油~
chunks.en: OP fighting~

chunks.zh: 面试被拒不一定是你自己的问题，说不定本来就没位置，面试 kpi 而已，纯粹浪费别人时间
chunks.en: Being rejected for an interview is not necessarily your own problem, maybe there was no position in the first place, just an interview KPI, purely wasting other people's time

chunks.zh: 面试有时候就是看缘分，总有适合你的工作或感情。
chunks.en: Sometimes interviews just depend on fate, there is always a job or relationship that is suitable for you.

chunks.zh: 问题不大，我发现每个男生 25 岁都会迷茫，我当初 25 岁也挺迷茫的，结果 27 岁就开窍了
chunks.en: No big deal, I found that every boy will be confused at 25 years old, I was also very confused at 25 years old, and as a result, I figured it out at 27.

chunks.zh: 27 岁以前我一次恋爱都没谈过，27 岁以后就开始不一样的生活了
chunks.en: I had never been in love once before I was 27 years old, after 27 years old I started a different life

chunks.zh: 可能 25 岁孤单寂寞的时候，我也忘了当初是怎么坚持下来的，但是我唯一可以肯定的是那个时候的我，不断坚持好习惯，对后来影响很大
chunks.en: Maybe when I was lonely at 25 years old, I also forgot how I persisted at the beginning, but the only thing I can be sure of is that at that time, I kept insisting on good habits, and it had a great impact on the future

chunks.zh: 不要因为一时的不如意，就全盘否定自己的一切。
chunks.en: Don't deny everything about yourself because of temporary setbacks.

chunks.zh: 记住现在的一切不过是未来的必经之路。
chunks.en: Remember that everything now is just a necessary path to the future.

chunks.zh: 别的不说，早起，健身，规律饮食。
chunks.en: Aside from anything else, get up early, exercise, and eat regularly.

chunks.zh: 除了事业上可能没什么长进，其他都能变好，加油
chunks.en: Except for the fact that there may not be much progress in your career, other things will improve, good luck

chunks.zh: 想想你刚出生的时候还是光屁溜，啥也没有。
chunks.en: Think about when you were born, you were still naked, with nothing.

chunks.zh: 从小事开始改变，比如：饮食、健身。
chunks.en: Start changing from small things, such as: diet, fitness.

chunks.zh: 大部分人的底色还是平凡，很少有人在 25 岁一鸣惊人。
chunks.en: The background of most people is still ordinary, and very few people make a splash at the age of 25.

chunks.zh: 加油
chunks.en: Good luck

chunks.zh: 多去运动 哪怕去公园走走 还有 被拒绝和期望值高都是非常正常的现象 如果把人生拉长看 不如意的事情太多太多了，每个阶段都有烦恼， 不如放短了看 当下的这一天 这一个小时 你有没有认真的对待 抓住当下 向前看
chunks.en: Go do more exercise, even if it's just taking a walk in the park. Also, being rejected and having high expectations are very normal phenomena. If you look at life in the long run, there are too many unsatisfactory things. Every stage has its worries. It's better to shorten it and look at the present day, this hour. Have you treated it seriously? Seize the moment and look forward.

chunks.zh: 面试被拒，easy ，此处不留“爷” 自有留爷处。
chunks.en: Rejected from an interview, easy, if 'I' am not welcome here, there will be other places that will welcome 'I'.

chunks.zh: 爷换成本宫单身 ，过来人说 要谈，不然遇到合适的 不会谈，可能错过健康，就多注意
chunks.en: 'I' changed to 'I' am single. Someone who has been there says you need to have relationships, otherwise you won't know how to have one when you meet the right person and may miss your health, so pay more attention.

chunks.zh: 楼上的尴尬不 笑死
chunks.en: The embarrassment of the person above is hilarious

chunks.zh: 本来想安慰下的，最后来句快 25 ，那我 30+了还这样岂不是人生完蛋了，给我整气急败坏了。
chunks.en: I wanted to comfort you, but you said you're almost 25, so wouldn't my life be over if I'm like this at 30+? It made me angry.

chunks.zh: 这么点问题在你这个年龄屁都不是，我看你就是矫情欠社会关爱了，被社会多爱几年再来发帖吐槽吧。
chunks.en: These little problems are nothing at your age. I think you're just being pretentious and need more social love. Come back and complain after being loved by society for a few more years.

chunks.zh: 25 的人还有无限的未来，过来人的建议是身体最重要，越到后边，你发现你的身体给你的加成越高，就算开会吵架，也是嗓门大的容易获胜，所以多锻炼身体
chunks.en: A 25-year-old has an unlimited future. The advice from someone who has been there is that the body is the most important. The further you go, the more you will find that your body gives you a higher bonus. Even if you quarrel in a meeting, the one with the loudest voice is more likely to win, so exercise more.

chunks.zh: 感情方面，25 的时候我追了个妹子，然后妹子跟我说，她希望她的另一半是能带她成长的，我还太幼稚；最后她找了个比他大的，过的挺好的，女孩子搞清楚自己的目标，找对象都容易的
chunks.en: In terms of relationships, when I was 25, I chased a girl, and then the girl told me that she hoped her other half could help her grow, and I was too naive; in the end, she found someone older than her, and she's doing well. It's easy for girls to find someone if they figure out their goals.

chunks.zh: 你别说，25 岁的时候 2019 年吧，那还真是我在打工以来最难熬的一年，没工作颓废的爬不起来，有了工作后，发现是龙潭虎穴每天焦虑的睡不着，天天站在地铁站楼梯想滚下去。
chunks.en: Don't even mention it, when I was 25, in 2019, that was really the most difficult year I've had since I started working. I was so depressed without a job that I couldn't get up. After I got a job, I found that it was a dangerous place, so I was so anxious that I couldn't sleep every day, and I wanted to roll down the stairs of the subway station every day.

chunks.zh: 我想说的是万事开头难，当接受了现状，就这样了，不会更差了，找准一个稍微跃起能实现的目标，然后下一个，再下一个，慢慢走出来吧。
chunks.en: What I want to say is that everything is difficult at the beginning. When you accept the status quo, that's it, it won't get worse. Find a goal that you can achieve with a slight leap, then the next one, and then the next one, and slowly get out of it.

chunks.zh: 最后身体很重要，再过几年熬夜的影响你就能感受到了，现在我完全熬不动夜
chunks.en: Finally, health is very important. You will feel the impact of staying up late in a few years. Now I can't stay up at all.

chunks.zh: 快 24 ，应该是 01 年的妹妹了，放宽心，别太焦虑，面试被拒很正常，把它当成是一个经验即可。
chunks.en: Almost 24, should be a younger sister born in 2001, relax, don't be too anxious, being rejected for an interview is normal, just treat it as an experience.

chunks.zh: 下一个更好。
chunks.en: The next one will be better.

chunks.zh: 想想我 19 年 24 岁的时候工作，连续碰到两家公司干了半年就解散了，那时候也是真难受。
chunks.en: Think about when I was 24 years old in 2019, I worked and encountered two companies that were disbanded after working for half a year. It was really uncomfortable at that time.

chunks.zh: 后面出去玩了阵子，换换心情回来继续找工作，也挺过来了。
chunks.en: Later I went out to play for a while, changed my mood, and came back to continue looking for a job, and I got through it.

chunks.zh: 现在 30 了，发现焦虑的还是那些事，所以没事的~
chunks.en: Now I'm 30, and I found that the things I'm anxious about are still those things, so it's okay~

chunks.zh: 世另我 同龄人 加油 会好起来的
chunks.en: You are another me. Fellow peers, good luck, things will get better
